unnormalised: Boru, tumi chint’ta asat kiteak, "Maths? Geometry? Trigonometry? Nid’diyetolem dista!" Punn mhojem aik, hanvem skulant tras kel’lo astana passun (dhanyavad, Mrs. Sharma, nirantar vyakhyanank lagun!), formu ani daigramachea khal khoob borem vostu lipoilolem asa. Tem fokot trianglechem shetrafal kadunk vo anglechem sine sodunk nhoi; tem amchea chovtani aslolem lokancho arth lavonk zai.
normalised: Baraabar, tumi chintit astole, "Ganit? Bhooiti? Trikonmiti? Nhid yevpachi vostu dista!" Pun mazo visvas theva, hanvem xallent kastt kel'lo astana (dhanyavad, Missus Sharma, sosonnasonne ulovnnachea khatir!), sutram ani aakritinchea khal khoob boreo vostu lipun asat. Tem fokot ek trikonnacho vistar ganche khatir va ek konnacho sine sodunche khatir nhui; tem amchea aazubazuchim vostu samajunche khatir asa.

unnormalised: Chintun porya. Geometry sogllekodden asa. Taj Mahal, tachem purn samanjasya, tumchea gharchi sadhi linam. Konn tori angle ani mapam kadonk zai asli him vostu sartun haddunk. Ani trigonometry? Tem injinyaram zago bandta ani architectam akash uchambachem ghor sarta. Tem sodren bandkamak adhar zata.
normalised: Tachi chinta kara. Bhooiti sogllekodden asa. Taj Mahal-ak, tachi purai samta asa, tumchea gharaachich sadi lini asta. Koni tari konn ani mapan sarpacho poddlo hem vostu asliyat korche khatir. Ani trikonmiti? Baraabar, tea khatir injiniyar pul design karat ani architect gaganachumbi imaroti banoitat. Tem sodhya nirmanacha bhartuchich haddi asa.

unnormalised: Ek vortulachi daigram yaad asa tumkam je linin kapta? Ho, chord! Ami puro hafto chord ani tangentancher karch kel’lo class 10vant. Tem nirarthak dista tedna punn atam mhaka dhyan yeta ki sambandh samjon gheunk zai. He fakt nirakar vishay nhoi, te upyogi sadhana.
normalised: Tumak dishta tea vortulachinchi aakriti zannen ek linin chepun gel'lean? Baraabar, chord! Ami chord ani tangentachea vixayan ek purai satto klas dha-ient ghalaylo. Tenna tem besar dista, pun hanvek samajhta ki hem soglle sambhand samajunche vixayan asa. Hem fokot amurt vichar nhui, te praktikal sadhan asat.

unnormalised: Ani Pythagorasak visronakant. A2 + B2 = C2. Tumkam skulache yad asteli, nahi? Tem geometria itlem mahatvachem ganvthem ani tem ascharyak padta. Rajasthanachi architectam ajun pasun tatuntlem tatvani vaparta gharachem bhumi ghatak sarthana.
normalised: Ani Pythagoras visorchonaka. Ek varg zoddun B varg ek C vargak samana asa. Tumi tenhachin xallethun tori gurtan thevta, baraabar? Tem bhooitintlea khub ganithancho buniyad asa, ani te achambit zatgan zagean yeta. Rajasthan-t architects tincho nirman korche khatir dengeleli niyamanchi vaparta.

unnormalised: Punn hango khoob borek dista. Trigonometry vat dakhoita. Tem sorem, antar sodta, marga dista, ani GPS kiteak kam korta. Anglant thoddoso chuk zalear dur dharunk chuk zata, dekhun tankam savdhani zai. Ek jahajiche captain trignometry vaparteli India-cho daryant vat dakhoita asthana jivit vachounk.
normalised: Pun ita asun khoob interest yeta. Trikonmiti margadarshanache khatir upyogi asa. Tem satya asa, antar, marg ani G-P-S koxem kaam karta tem sodunche khatir. Konache thodde chukan vostu mailanchi dur asa, teka khatir purai mahatvachi asa. Eka zaharacho kaptan trikonmiti vaparta Bharoti mhasagarachem margadarshan korun harvun vanchavche khatir.

unnormalised: Atam, mhaka mahit asa tumi chintat: "Punn ami kelhench upyog karteli amchea jivitant!" Tumi bhoktichem uch ghorache uch trig ratios vaprun kadunk vo golkache aaytanak 4/3πr³ vaprun sodunk naka, punn tarkik vichar ani samasya-nirakaranak lagun jem geometry ani trigonometrytum siktat tem khoob mahatvachem zata. Tem tumkam pratyek uttejanank vyavasthit ani vivechak rupant vatt dakhoita, jem konnachea vyavasayik upyogi zata.
normalised: Ata, hanvek gurt asa tumi chintit astole: "Pun hanv kadich hea vastuchea jivanan vaparcho nhoi!" Tumak trig ratio vaprun eka imaratachinchi uchai ganvcho garaz poddchonaka va ek golyachincho vistar char bhagilea tin pi r cubed vaprun sodunche garaz poddchonaka, pun tumi ganitantlea ganit ani trikonmitithun xiktat tea tarkik chintn ani problem-solvingachi hunar khub mulyavan asat. Te tumak eka ganithik ani vicharlelya vatena prashnache samore yevpak maddat kartat, hem konnenui vevsayat upyogi asa.

unnormalised: Ani sorem, punn kadachit sorem watta tumchechim uttejanank pratibandh diunk. Yaad asa tumkam kitich kashtache samasyank sangank ami vaprtale? Ghanta sarun soglle angle ani baazu kashe mevlolam tem kadunk khoob anand zata. Vishesh, jednam tumchim javab sorem zata! Tumi thoddi dharye vaddoita zo sangta, "Ho, ami kitem kadunk kartam!"
normalised: Ani satyen sangta, kadinch tem tumache ud'dhish puro karcho upyogi yeta. Tumaka gurt asa te vikte prashn te amka sadya korche mellta? Soglle konn ani bazun koxe jodelat tem sodunche khatir vell ghalun tumak dhir divpa sarkhech asa. Khas korun tumi ut'tar barobar melltelina! Tem tumaka dhir divpa sarkhech asa, "Hey, hanv samazan sodun kadtam!"

unnormalised: Ek sadhi samasya vichar karteli. Tumi ujve-anglechem triangle dhoron asa jem baazu 3 cm ani 4 cm, hypotonouse (Pythagoras-chem niyam vaprun) sqrt(3² + 4²) = 5 cm asteli. Disla? Itlem bhikar disona! Fokot formu vapra.
normalised: Ek sado prashn chintana gheuya. Tumachekodden ek konn-uyevo trikon zannen bazun tin centimeter ani char centimeter asta, korn (Pythagoras theorem vaprun) tin squared zoddun char squared vargmul ponch centimeter yeta. Tumaka dishta? Torri bhivachi asonko! Fokot sutra vapra.

unnormalised: Chint nakat tumik ajun disla geometry ani trigonometry thode bhirantik asa. Tem chuk zata, tem adhar magunk kartam. Mukhy vostu tem tumkam unkem mon diunk zai ani he bunyadi ganithache tatvanak chita diunk zai.
normalised: Tumaka dukhnaka tumi azun tori bhivchi asat bhooiti ani trikonmitiche vixayan. Dukhanachin goroz nasta, tumche madath magpache svatantrya asa. Mahatvachi vostu tumachem mon uktem theva ani hem mulbhut ganitache vicharache sundarta ani xaktik man di.

unnormalised: Zalea, ek borem disolelem ghor dixta, ek sartichem zago bandila, vo ek ashtachea margachem yevasta, tem geometry ani trigonometry tanche mukhel hero asa. Ani konn tori zanna, tumi tumcho lokak novyan rupantan (geometric) dista! Mhojem yad dista, vartulachem shetrafal pi*r^2 asa! Tiwari sweets-chea jalebi gheunk velar!
normalised: Mhun, tumi ek sunder imarat, ek purai madpaacho pul va ek ganjal margadarshan vevasta dekhtana, tumaka gurt asa bhooiti ani trikonmiti tinchea fattinche anaik gayan asat. Ani konn zannoi, tumi jagak nove dishta (bhooitiche) vatena dektale! Tumka yad asta bhitar, vortulacho vistar pi r squared asa! Tiwari sweets thun jalebi mellavache vor!
